mapper.select: select * from b_comment where board_num = #{boardNum} order by b_comment_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into b_comment (comment_content, board_num, user_num) values(#{commentContent}, #{boardNum}, #{userNum})
mapper.update: update b_comment set comment_content = #{commentContent}, comment_time = current_timestamp where comment_num = #{commentNum}
